text.div:
MedicationKind

Whether the medication is a product or a package

This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/medication-kind

CodeDisplayDefinition
productThe medication is a product.
packageThe medication is a package - a contained group of one of more products.

name: MedicationKind
description: Whether the medication is a product or a package

concept.definition: The medication is a package - a contained group of one of more products.
